flawed_nl_solution:
When Jayson is 10 his dad is 10 x 4 = <<10*4=40>>40 years old.
His mom is 40 - 2 = <<40-2=39>>39 years old.
When Jayson is born, his mom is 39 - 10 = <<39-10=29>>29 years old.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 38, not 39. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
